entry.title: dotnet/sdk - Issues & Pull Requests - 2022-04-12
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • dotnet add reference - support external dll #24816
  • [workloads] Confusing errors during installation #24815
  • Some questions about hotreload #24814

Closed

  • Download and install .Net 7.0.100-preview.4.22211.9 SDK, the global.json file not found. #24807
  • [Loc]With .NET 7 Preview 3 SDK installed on local OS, "Installation Source" is not localized after running "dotnet workload list" #24762

PullRequests

Created

  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24830
    Area-Infrastructure
  • bump WarningLevel to 7 for .NET 7 #24826
    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.1xx' => 'release/6.0.2xx' #24823
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Replace rollForward in tools runtimeconfig #24817
    Area-Infrastructure

Merged

  • Merging internal commits for release/5.0.4xx #24819
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.2xx #24821
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Localized file check-in by OneLocBuild Task: Build definition ID 140: Build ID 1712391 #24673
    Area-Infrastructure
  • Merging internal commits for release/6.0.1xx #24822
    Area-Infrastructure

    Area-Infrastructure

    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 5.0.408 #24712
    Area-Infrastructure

    Area-Infrastructure

    Area-Infrastructure
  • Update branding to 6.0.105 #24713
    Area-Infrastructure

    Area-Infrastructure
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0.2xx' => 'release/6.0.3xx' #24800
    Area-Infrastructure

Updated

  • Pin the compiler version in RSG to an exact version #24598
    Servicing-approved, Area-Infrastructure, 6.0.2xx
  • Merge branch 'release/6.0.3xx' => 'main' #24760
